Ya that's why I also don't think it's sustainable to keep increasing GST. I can't believe in my short lifetime I experience 3 GST hikes already...The issue w GST vouchers is also that its given one lump sum. Idk how come the whole MOF never consider that households cannot realistically swee swee allocate GST relief across 12 mths or 24 mths or whatever.I don't want to be bus3rd but usually those who need GST vouchers the most are not the best at financial planning thru no fault of their own. What do they do when they have been scrimping for 11 mths and suddenly get zheng hu lui?
